title: Castle Rock Season 3, Episode 1: Act 3
itunes:title: Castle Rock Season 3, Episode 1: Act 3
itunes:subtitle: Every story has an ending. Today, The Losers' Club returns with the third and final installment in their audio drama/parody Castle Rock Season 3, Episode 1. This fiery chapter finds Stephen King's deadliest villains bringing an all-out war to...
description:
Every story has an ending. Today, The Losers' Club returns with the third and final installment in their audio drama/parody Castle Rock Season 3, Episode 1. This fiery chapter finds Stephen King's deadliest villains bringing an all-out war to the rustic streets of his titular town. Rest assured, blood will be split, buildings will burn, and Cujo will bark yet again.


Production by Cat Blackard. Edited by Kyle Orozovich. Written by Randall Colburn.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
